achievements.title: Refinement of Data Processing in Model Build and Analysis Pipeline
achievements.description: Transformed raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing, troubleshooting pipeline failures, and optimizing system scalability through time complexity improvements at National Renewable Energy Laboratory.
reference_context: Work experience at National Renewable Energy Laboratory

achievements.title: DevOps Process Automation
achievements.description: Streamlined and automated DevOps processes by restructuring CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions, enhancing deployment efficiency at National Renewable Energy Laboratory.
reference_context: Work experience at National Renewable Energy Laboratory

achievements.title: Implementation of OFSAA LLFP Fintech Solutions
achievements.description: Successfully implemented fintech solutions and provided post-implementation support for two international financial banking firms, enhancing UI and automating data manipulation tasks, at Oracle Financial Services Software.
reference_context: Work experience at Oracle Financial Services Software

achievements.title: AICamp Generative AI Hackathon Win
achievements.description: Achieved the Overall Winner prize by creating a multimodal AI assistant that automates browser tasks for users, winning the AWS for Startups award.
reference_context: Extracurricular Participation at AICamp Generative AI Hackathon

achievements.title: Development of Cloud-based Video Face Recognition App
achievements.description: Designed a 3-tier hybrid cloud architecture leveraging AWS and OpenStack for integration of Web, App, and Data tiers, scaling EC2 instances and preparing scripts for various AWS services.
reference_context: Projects: Cloud-based Video Face Recognition App

achievements.title: Embedded C++ Development for Temperature Sensor Device
achievements.description: Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device, optimizing system for real-time sensor data handling at Inter-university accelerator centre.
reference_context: Work experience at Inter-university accelerator centre

achievements.title: Engineering of Microservices for Video to MP3 Conversion
achievements.description: Engineered a distributed system using microservices architecture for converting video files to MP3 format, implementing secure JWT authentication and scalable storage solutions.
reference_context: Projects: Microservices Video to MP3 Converter

achievements.title: Design of Custom Python Library for Sensor Data Mining
achievements.description: Successfully modeled Rough Set Theory concepts and designed a Python library to process large data sets with a 95% accuracy at College of Engineering Pune.
reference_context: Work experience at College of Engineering Pune
